Sentencas: A 5/15 kW-class reversible Solid Oxide Cell (rSOC) system was developed and experimentally investigated at the Forschungszentrum Julich GmbH.
Titulo: Long-Term Experience with a 5/15kW-Class Reversible Solid Oxide Cell System

Sentencas: The main component of this system is the well-established Julich Integrated Module, which consists of four 10-layer SOC sub-stacks with an active cell area per layer of 320 cm(2).
Titulo: Long-Term Experience with a 5/15kW-Class Reversible Solid Oxide Cell System

Sentencas: The other necessary system components, such as the evaporator, condenser and blowers are compactly arranged in the vicinity of the Integrated Module.
Titulo: Long-Term Experience with a 5/15kW-Class Reversible Solid Oxide Cell System

Sentencas: The system's total operation time was more than 9000 h, in detail 2607 h in fuel cells, 6043 h in electrolysis and 448 h in hot standby mode.
Titulo: Long-Term Experience with a 5/15kW-Class Reversible Solid Oxide Cell System

Sentencas: In fuel cell mode, a power of 5374 W-DC at 0.5 A cm(-2) at a fuel utilization of 97.3% was delivered, which resulted in a DC electrical system's efficiency of 62.7% (LHV).
Titulo: Long-Term Experience with a 5/15kW-Class Reversible Solid Oxide Cell System

Sentencas: Furthermore, in electrolysis mode, a power of -14347 W-DC was consumed at 0.89 A cm(-2).
Titulo: Long-Term Experience with a 5/15kW-Class Reversible Solid Oxide Cell System

Sentencas: At this operating point, the system's DC efficiency reached 70% at a steam utilization of 85%.
Titulo: Long-Term Experience with a 5/15kW-Class Reversible Solid Oxide Cell System
